mapper.select: select A.*,B.images from p_experter_info A left join p_user_goods B on A.goods_id = B.id where A.id = #{id}

select A.*, B.expert_name as experterName, C.name as goodsName, C.images from p_experter_info A left join p_experter B on A.experter_id = B.id left join p_user_goods C on A.goods_id = C.id where 1 = 1
and B.expert_name like '%${experterName}%'
and C.name like '%${goodsName}%'
order by A.create_time desc;
